Collin C, Wade DT, Davies S, Horne V. The Barthel ADL Index: a reliability study. Int Disabil Stud. 1988;10(2):61-3. PubMed PMID: 3403500.

details.purpose: Zur Darstellung einer funktionellen Bewertung für Alltagsaktivitäten unter Verwendung der modifizierten Version des Barthel-Index.
details.use: Zur Darstellung einer funktionellen Bewertung für Alltagsaktivitäten unter Verwendung der modifizierten Version des Barthel-Index.

details.purpose: Для записи оценки зависимости от посторонней помощи в повседневной жизни. Общая оценка - сумма баллов каждого атрибута.
details.use: Для оценки независимости от посторонней помощи. Часто в доме престарелых.
details.misuse: Не использовать для описания индивидуальных особенностей.

details.purpose: For å registrere Barthel ADL-indeks skår for behov for hjelp til aktiviteter i dagliglivet.
details.use:
Brukes for å registrere Barthel ADL-indeks skår for behov for hjelp til aktiviteter i dagliglivet. Totalskåren er summen av de enkelte underpunktene.
OBS: Maryland State Medical Society har copyright på Barthel indeks. Den kan brukes til ikke-kommersielle formål med følgende sitat: Mahoney FI, Barthel D. “Functional evaluation: the Barthel Index.” Maryland State Med Journal 1965;14:56-61. Used with permission.
For modifisering eller kommersiell bruk kreves det tillatelse.
details.misuse: Om en kun bruker enkeltelementer fra scoringen må feltet "Totalskår" ikke benyttes, siden summering av enkeltelementer fra arketypen vil gi ufullstendig totalskår.

details.purpose: لتسجيل حرز الاعتماد على المساعدة للقيام بالأنشطة المهمة في الحياة اليومية. الحرز الإجمالي هو مجموع الأحراز الترتيبية لكل صفة.
details.use: لتجميع حرز استقلالية الأشخاص - حتى في دار المسنين.

details.purpose: To record a functional assessment for activities of daily living using the modified version of the Barthel index.
details.use: Use to record a functional assessment for activities of daily living using the modified version of the Barthel index.

details.purpose: To record a score of dependency on help to undertake important activities of daily living. The total score is the sum of the ordinal scores for each attribute.
details.use: For scoring people's independence - often in a nursing home.
details.misuse: Not to be used to record individual features.

items.items: *Modification of the Barthel index, used as a functional assessment for activities of daily living (ADL).(en)
*Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.(en)
*Assessment of urinary control over the previous week, occasional accident <= 1 time per week.(en)
*Af en toe een ongelukje (max. 1 keer per 24 uur)(nl)
*Over the previous week, occasional accident is once per week.(en)
*Onafhankelijk = zonder toezicht of hulp in en uit bad stappen en zichzelf wassen.(nl)
*Ability to choose clothes, put them on and fasten them.(en)
*Heeft hulp nodig maar kan oeveer de helft zelf(nl)

*Hulp = een ongetraind persoon, incl. toezicht en morele steun.Onafhankelijk = kan zich verplaatsen in huis of op afdeling; hulpmiddel mag worden gebruikt. Een patiÃ«nt in rolstoel moet zonder hulp met hoeken en deuren kunnen omgaan.(nl)
*Person can get less than 50 metres in wheelchair.(en)
*Person walks with assistance of one person, with physical or verbal assistance.(en)
*Transfer from bed to chair and back.(en)
*No sitting balance, a lifting device is used.(en)
*A strong trained person or 2 people required, patient can sit straight.(en)
*Weinig hulp (met hulp van woorden of lichamelijk)(nl)
*Person can move from bed to chair independently.(en)
*Heeft hulp nodig bij snijden, smeren van boter, enz.(nl)

*Met hulp = kan zich afvegen en enige van bovenstaande handelingen uitvoeren.Onafhankelijk = in staat om naar toilet te gaan, zich voldoende uit te kleden, schoon te maken, aan te kleden en weg te gaan.(nl)
*Heeft enige hulp nodig maar kan sommige dingen zelf(nl)
*Onafhankelijk (op en af, uit- en aankleden, afvegen)(nl)
*Ability over the previous 24-48 hours to attend to personal hygiene such as brushing teeth, shaving and washing.(en)
*Less than or equal to once per week.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*Additional narrative about the modified Barthel index, not captured in other fields.(en)
*Narrative descripiton of any issues or factors that may impact on the scoring.(en)
*Modification of the Barthel index, used as a functional assessment for activities of daily living (ADL).(en)
*Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.(en)
*Assessment of urinary control over the previous week, occasional accident <= 1 time per week.(en)
Af en toe een ongelukje (max. 1 keer per 24 uur)
*Over the previous week, occasional accident is once per week.(en)
Onafhankelijk = zonder toezicht of hulp in en uit bad stappen en zichzelf wassen.
*Ability to choose clothes, put them on and fasten them.(en)
Heeft hulp nodig maar kan oeveer de helft zelf

Hulp = een ongetraind persoon, incl. toezicht en morele steun.Onafhankelijk = kan zich verplaatsen in huis of op afdeling; hulpmiddel mag worden gebruikt. Een patiÃ«nt in rolstoel moet zonder hulp met hoeken en deuren kunnen omgaan.
*Person can get less than 50 metres in wheelchair.(en)
*Person walks with assistance of one person, with physical or verbal assistance.(en)
*Transfer from bed to chair and back.(en)
*No sitting balance, a lifting device is used.(en)
*A strong trained person or 2 people required, patient can sit straight.(en)
Weinig hulp (met hulp van woorden of lichamelijk)
*Person can move from bed to chair independently.(en)
Heeft hulp nodig bij snijden, smeren van boter, enz.

Met hulp = kan zich afvegen en enige van bovenstaande handelingen uitvoeren.Onafhankelijk = in staat om naar toilet te gaan, zich voldoende uit te kleden, schoon te maken, aan te kleden en weg te gaan.
Heeft enige hulp nodig maar kan sommige dingen zelf
Onafhankelijk (op en af, uit- en aankleden, afvegen)
*Ability over the previous 24-48 hours to attend to personal hygiene such as brushing teeth, shaving and washing.(en)
Heeft hulp nodig (woorden, lichamelijk of hulpmiddel)
Onafhankelijk naar boven en naar beneden
*Less than or equal to once per week.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*Additional narrative about the modified Barthel index, not captured in other fields.(en)
*Narrative descripiton of any issues or factors that may impact on the scoring.(en)
Modification of the Barthel index, used as a functional assessment for activities of daily living (ADL).
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
Assessment of urinary control over the previous week, occasional accident <= 1 time per week.
Less than or equal to once per week.
Continent includes self management of catheter.
Over the previous week, occasional accident is once per week.
Independent = without supervision or help when getting in and out of the bath and when washing.
Needs assistance with baths or showers.
No help required when getting in and out of the bath or when washing.
Ability to choose clothes, put them on and fasten them.
Requires assistance choosing and putting on clothes.
Needs help but can do about half unaided
Needs help only with buttons, zippers but can put on clothes unaided.
Sum of the individual scores assigned for each of the contributing variables.
A score of 0-9 indicates high dependency, 10-19 moderate dependency and 20 is independent.
Ability to get about the house or institution.
Person can get less than 50 metres in wheelchair.
Person walks with assistance of one person, with physical or verbal assistance.
Transfer from bed to chair and back.
No sitting balance, a lifting device is used.
A strong trained person or 2 people required, patient can sit straight.
A person is required for supervision or some help.
Person can move from bed to chair independently.
Requires help cutting, spreading butter or requires modified diet - able to eat alone.
Ability to use toilet over the previous 48 hours.
Person is completely dependent of others to use the toilet.
Needs some help but can do some tasks alone
Person is self-supporting in some toileting tasks.
Person is fully self-supporting in all toileting tasks.
Ability over the previous 24-48 hours to attend to personal hygiene such as brushing teeth, shaving and washing.
Able to brush teeth, hair, wash face, shave.
Incontinent of faeces or requires enemas.
Person can use any aid (not wheelchair) around the house or ward.
Can carry aid alone if required.
Less than or equal to once per week.
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.
Additional narrative about the modified Barthel index, not captured in other fields.
Narrative descripiton of any issues or factors that may impact on the scoring.
*Modification of the Barthel index, used as a functional assessment for activities of daily living (ADL).(en)
*Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.(en)
*Assessment of urinary control over the previous week, occasional accident <= 1 time per week.(en)
*Over the previous week, occasional accident is once per week.(en)
Самостоятельно: без присмотра и помощи может дойти до ванной и самостоятельно моется.
*Ability to choose clothes, put them on and fasten them.(en)
Нужна помощь с кнопками, пуговицами, молниями
*Person can get less than 50 metres in wheelchair.(en)
*Person walks with assistance of one person, with physical or verbal assistance.(en)
*Transfer from bed to chair and back.(en)
*No sitting balance, a lifting device is used.(en)
*A strong trained person or 2 people required, patient can sit straight.(en)
С незначительной физической или словесной помощью
*Person can move from bed to chair independently.(en)
Нужна помощь: нарезать, намазать масло и т.д.
Самостоятельно - может сам пойти в туалет, достаточно раздеться, соблюсти чистоту, одеться и уйти.
С посторонней помощью, некоторые действия - самостоятельно
Независимый (включения и выключения, одевания и раздевания, вытирания
*Ability over the previous 24-48 hours to attend to personal hygiene such as brushing teeth, shaving and washing.(en)
Полностью самостоятельно (мытьё лица, волос, бритьё, чистка зубов)
С помощью слов или поддерживающих устройств
*Less than or equal to once per week.(en)
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*Additional narrative about the modified Barthel index, not captured in other fields.(en)
*Narrative descripiton of any issues or factors that may impact on the scoring.(en)
*Modification of the Barthel index, used as a functional assessment for activities of daily living (ADL).(en)
Standard, uspesifisert tidspunkt eller tidsintervall som kan defineres mer eksplisitt i en template eller i en applikasjon.
*Assessment of urinary control over the previous week, occasional accident <= 1 time per week.(en)
Helt inkontinent eller trenger permanent kateter.
Nedsatt kontroll og enkelte "uhell" eller holder seg tørr med uridom eller kateter, men trenger hjelp for å bruke dette.
Holder seg evt. tørr ved bruk av uridom eller mestrer bruk av kateter på egen hånd.
*Over the previous week, occasional accident is once per week.(en)
Evne til å bade eller dusje på egen hånd.
*Ability to choose clothes, put them on and fasten them.(en)
Trenger hjelp til mer enn halvparten
Trenger hjelp til mer enn halvparten ved påkledning.
Trenger hjelp, men klarer halvparten innen rimelig tid
Trenger hjelp, men klarer halvparten innen rimelig tid.
Summen av de 10 elementene i Barthel ADL-indeks. Tall på 0-9 indikerer høyt hjelpebehov, 10-19 moderat hjelpebehov og 20 er selvhjulpen.
Dette feltet skal ikke brukes dersom man kun benytter utvalgte felt i arketypen.
Evne til å forflytte seg til fots eller i rullestol.
*Person can get less than 50 metres in wheelchair.(en)
*Person walks with assistance of one person, with physical or verbal assistance.(en)
*Transfer from bed to chair and back.(en)
*No sitting balance, a lifting device is used.(en)
*A strong trained person or 2 people required, patient can sit straight.(en)
Klarer forflytning med litt hjelp eller tilsyn
Klarer forflytning med litt hjelp eller tilsyn.
*Person can move from bed to chair independently.(en)
Behov for noe hjelp, f.eks. til å skjære opp maten.
Helt selvhjulpen. Kan bruke nødvendige hjelpemidler og spiser innen rimelig tid.
Evne til å gå på toalettet.
Trenger hjelp til forflytning, klær, tørke seg.
Selvhjulpen ved toalettbesøk eller bruk av toalettstol. Ordner klær, tørker seg, spyler toalettet eller tømmer bekken.
*Ability over the previous 24-48 hours to attend to personal hygiene such as brushing teeth, shaving and washing.(en)
Trenger hjelp til en eller flere oppgaver.
Selvhjulpen. Klarer å vaske ansiktet, kjemme håret, pusse tenner og barbere seg.
Klarer selv evt. å sette stikkpille/klyx.
Kan gå uten hjelp, evt med stokk/krykker
Klarer å gå 50 meter, kan bruke stokk eller krykker, men ikke annet ganghjelpemiddel.
Evne til å gå i trapper.
Nedsatt kontroll og enkelte "uhell" eller trenger hjelp til evt. å sette stikkpiller/klyx.
Ytterligere informasjon som trengs for å kunne registrere lokalt definert innhold eller for å tilpasse til andre referansemodeller/formalismer.
For eksempel lokale informasjonsbehov eller ytterligere metadata for å kunne tilpasse til tilsvarende konsepter i FHIR eller CIMI.
*Additional narrative about the modified Barthel index, not captured in other fields.(en)
Fritekstbeskrivelse av problemer eller faktorer som kan ha påvirkning på skåringen.
Änderung des Barthel-Index, der als funktionelle Bewertung für Alltagsaktivitäten (ADL) verwendet wird.
Standardwert, ein undefinierter/s Zeitpunkt oder Intervallereignis, das explizit im Template oder zur Laufzeit der Anwendung definiert werden kann.
Beurteilung der Urinkontrolle in der Vorwoche, gelegentlicher Urinverlust <= 1 Mal pro Woche.
Weniger als oder gleich einmal pro Woche.
Kontinent, umfasst eigenständige Anwendung von Katheter.
In der Vorwoche kam es einmal pro Woche zu gelegentlichen Kontrollverlusten.
Selbstständig = ohne Aufsicht oder Hilfe beim Ein- und Aussteigen aus dem Bad und beim Waschen.
Benötigt Unterstützung beim Baden oder Duschen.
Keine Hilfe beim An- und Auskleiden im Bad oder beim Waschen erforderlich.
Fähigkeit, Kleidung auszuwählen, anzuziehen und zu befestigen.
Benötigt Unterstützung beim Auswählen und Anziehen von Kleidung.
Benötigt Hilfe, kann aber ungefähr die Hälfte ohne Hilfe tun
Benötigt Hilfe nur mit Knöpfen, Reißverschlüssen, kann aber ohne fremde Hilfe Kleidung anziehen.
Summe der einzelnen Bewertungen, die für jede der beitragenden Variablen zugewiesen wurden.
Ein Wert von 0-9 zeigt eine hohe Abhängigkeit an, 10-19 eine moderate Abhängigkeit und mit 20 ist sebstständig.
Fähigkeit, sich im Haus oder in der Einrichtung zurechtzufinden.
Person kann weniger als 50 Meter im Rollstuhl zurücklegen.
Die Person geht mit Hilfe einer Person, mit körperlicher oder verbaler Hilfe.
Transfer vom Bett zum Stuhl und zurück.
Keine Sitzbalance, eine Hebevorrichtung wird verwendet.
Eine körperlich kräftige Person oder 2 Personen erforderlich, der Patient kann gerade sitzen.
Eine Person ist zur Überwachung oder Hilfe erforderlich.
Die Person kann sich selbstständig vom Bett zum Stuhl bewegen.
Benötigt Hilfe beim Schneiden, Butter auftragen oder erfordert eine veränderte Ernährung - kann alleine essen.
Fähigkeit, die Toilette in den letzten 48 Stunden zu benutzen.
Die Person ist völlig von anderen abhängig, um die Toilette zu benutzen.
Benötigt Hilfe, kann aber einige Aufgaben alleine erledigen
Die Person ist selbstständig bei einigen Toilettenaufgaben.
Die Person ist bei allen Toilettenaufgaben völlig selbständig.
Fähigkeit in den letzten 24-48 Stunden, sich um persönliche Hygiene wie Zähneputzen, Rasieren und Waschen zu kümmern.
Kann Zähne putzen, Haare und Gesicht waschen, sich rasieren.
Die Person kann jedes Hilfsmittel (nicht Rollstuhl) rund um das Haus oder die Station benutzen.
Kann alleine, mit Hilfsmitteln bei Bedarf.
Weniger als oder gleich einmal pro Woche.
Zusätzliche Informationen zur Erfassung lokaler Inhalte oder Anpassung an andere Referenzmodelle/Formalismen.
Zum Beispiel: Lokaler Informationsbedarf oder zusätzliche Metadaten zur Anpassung an FHIR-Ressourcen oder CIMI-Modelle.
Zusätzliche Beschreibung des modifizierten Barthel-Index, die in anderen Feldern nicht dargestellt wurde.
Beschreibung aller Probleme oder Faktoren, die sich auf die Bewertung auswirken können.
